name: Ice Cream Truck 2020
description:
Ice Cream Truck 2020

Submission for Weekly Game Jam 187! Theme is Ice Cream Truck.

Coded everything in GMS2, and drew all of the assets myself within the week.

Put in a bit of extra time to make it both PC + mobile friendly.

Known Bugs

For some reason, when I click out of the game window, and back in, the keyboard input is no longer registered, as though it's no longer in focus. Refreshing the page seems to help.
